mapper.select: select pc.id,pc.courseid,pc.name,pc.coursecontext,pc.classnumber,pc.createtime ,pt.name as teacher from pd_course pc,pd_teacher pt where pc.isdelete=0 and pc.teacher=pt.uid and pc.isdelete=0

select pc.id,pc.courseid,pc.name,pc.coursecontext,pc.classnumber,pc.createtime ,pt.name as teacher from pd_course pc,pd_teacher pt where pc.isdelete=0 and pc.teacher=pt.uid and concat(pt.name,pc.name) like "%"#{keywords}"%" and pc.isdelete=0

select pc.id,pc.courseid,pc.name,pc.coursecontext,pc.classnumber,pc.createtime ,pt.name as teacher from pd_course_choose as pcc,pd_course as pc,pd_teacher as pt where pcc.uid=#{uid} and pc.isdelete=0 and pc.teacher=pt.uid and pcc.courseid=pc.courseid
mapper.delete: delete from pd_course_choose where uid=#{uid} and courseid=#{courseId}
DELETE from pd_homework_status where uid=#{uid} and homeworkid in(SELECT id from pd_homework where courseid=#{courseId})
mapper.select: SELECT pa.*,pc.name as courseName from pd_course_choose as pcc,pd_attachment as pa,pd_course as pc WHERE pcc.uid=#{uid} and pcc.courseid=pa.courseid and pc.courseid=pcc.courseid
